name: Project Star: Makeover Story
description:
Project Star: Makeover Story

Pave your way toward stardom! Fashion yourself with a great variety of outfits, makeup, and hairstyles to catch the attention of directors and audients. Find the most fitting dressing theme to pass challenging auditions. Recruit artistes and managers to build your own kingdom in showbiz. Feel the experience of an authentic superstar.

[DRESS UP]: Choose from thousands of clothes of distinct styles to find the perfect look.

[MAKEUP]: Show your own fashion style and beauty through customized makeup.

[STORY]: Discover the exciting plots between you and other celebrities.

[COLLECTION]: Build your kingdom in showbiz by inviting other artistes, hiring managers, and uncovering talented trainees.

[PET]: Come back home to your fluffy friends, and let them strip away all the stress.

[COMPETITION]: Compete with in-game characters and real players in Arenas to get abundant rewards.

If you encounter any problem in the game, feel free to contact us at:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/projectstargame
E-mail: service@projectstargame.com
Office Hours: Mon – Fri, 9 am to 8 pm. GMT+8
